content:
# Report

## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Furnace at position(4.0, -60.0)
Consists of a stone furnace that smelts iron ore into iron plates. The furnace has an inventory of coal (fuel), iron-ore (source) and iron-plate (result).

### Chest at position(4.5, -58.5)
Consists of an iron chest that can store items. The chest has an empty inventory.

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when crafting iron chests due to missing iron plates
- The agent repeatedly attempts to craft iron chests but fails because it does not have enough iron plates. Ensure that enough iron plates are available before attempting to craft iron chests.

## NAMESPACE

### Variables:
- No variables have been assigned.
